# <a name="how-to-view-outlookcom-message-headers-or-message-source"></a><span data-ttu-id="f8e78-102">Kako prikazati zaglavlja Outlook.com poruka ili izvora poruka?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8e78-102">How to view Outlook.com message headers or message source</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="f8e78-103">Da biste videli zaglavlja i druge detalje u e-poruci, izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8e78-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="f8e78-104">u gornjem uglu okna za čitanje i izaberite stavku " **Prikaz izvora poruka**".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="f8e78-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
